about.title: About
about.text: Full-stack Software Engineer from Hungary. Passionate about software quality (UX design, design patterns, clean coding, unit testing, linting). Fluent in JavaScript, although believes polyglot development is a good philosophy as engineers should not be locked into a single language and should always adapt the technology according to the problem. Likes to try out new libraries/languages, write blog posts and hack together useful solutions (which sometimes end up on GitHub).

items.name: Coding Sans Ltd.

Architecting multiple projects module-, API- and database structure-wise

Competence in development of social network application, cloud-based healthcare management solution, sports betting application, innovative sales web and mobile app, marketing-through-SMS solution and email creator/editor web application
Backend: Node with notable frameworks: Express, Koa, Mongoose, Sequelize, Serverless
Frontend: AngularJS (v1.x), Angular (v2 and up), React (with Redux), Vue, Web components, Protractor, Cucumber
Database: Relational (MySQL/MariaDB, Postgres) and NoSQL (MongoDB, Redis)
Other: Docker, Git, Bash, AWS and Heroku (for ops)
